title: MindShelf
shortDescription: Personalized content curation platform to save and manage articles & videos.
fullDescription: Developed a full-stack MERN application for users to save, categorize, and manage online content like articles and videos through a responsive interface. Architected a decoupled system with a Node.js REST API and implemented secure Google Sign-In using Firebase Authentication. Deployed on Vercel.

title: Real-Time ISL to Text Translator
shortDescription: Vision-based system that recognizes Indian Sign Language gestures from webcam and translates them to text.
fullDescription: Designing a real-time vision-based system to recognize Indian Sign Language (ISL) gestures via a laptop webcam and translate them into text using deep learning models. Implementing convolutional neural networks and Vision Transformers with buffering and sequence modeling to achieve accurate, low-latency translation suitable for accessible communication.

title: ML-driven AGV Swarm Path Planning Simulator
shortDescription: Simulator for IoRT-based AGV swarm with multi-agent coordination and adaptive rerouting.
fullDescription: Built an ML-driven simulator for IoRT-based AGV swarm path planning with multi-agent coordination, real-time obstacle avoidance, and adaptive rerouting. Implemented dynamic task allocation and shortest-path algorithms on a 9Ã—9 grid to optimize traffic flow and minimize collisions. Integrated real-time monitoring and predictive analytics for logistics in hospitals and smart warehouses.
